FULL_Salām ʿalaykum! Kidayr a ṣāḥbi, waš:
Salaam ʿalaykum! Kidayr a ṣāḥbi, waš kul shī mzyān? Rani bġīt nshoufek had sbaḥ, walakin lḥaqiqa makanch fāḍī. L-ḥāl mzīyan daba, kayn shams u ṣḥā, w ṣāfī rani ʿāyān shwiya. 

L-bārḥ shṛīt chi ḥwāyǧ jdād mn l-marché f l-mdīna, wlakin maʿrftš wach dayrīn b ṣḥḥa. Wach tḥb ttji mʿaya nchof chi ḥaja? Kān gūltī līya shḥāl mn mrra lli bġīt chi ṣbāṭ jdīd, fink daba? 

Bġīt nḥawel ndīr chi planning l had l-3tla, bṣaḥ makayench bzaf d l-flūs. Wach nḥawlo nšof chi riḥla l jabal, ola n-mšīw l-bḥar? Kān bġīt ḥaja dakchi lli koulna ghi goulī līya.
